title: Research
text:
I am fascinated with soils and their potential to combat global climate change. Soils can help us in deep understanding of the Earth systems and potential challenges at the intersection of different environmental entities and their associated feedbacks. It is an exciting time to study soils!!


  image taken by me during our Pedology class!

title: Vaasuki Marupaka
text:
LinkedIn

     Contact Email
  

  
  


Thank you for stopping by! I’m Vaasuki, and I’m from Hyderabad, South-India where I spent most of my life. I am currently a second year PhD student researching on soil carbon dynamics and underlying biogeochemistry through the lens of global soil data at the University of Florida, Gainesville.
Stop by and checkout some of my research work going forward!



PhD student in Environmental Engineering | 2022 - Present
University of Florida | Gainesville, Florida
M.S in Soil and Water Sciences | 2019 - 2021
University of Florida | Gainesville, Florida
B.S in Agricultural Sciences | 2013 - 2017
Agricultural University | Hyderabad, India
